extracted-table.table-caption: Regions of interest (ROIs) used for functional connectivity analysis.

caption.p: Regions of interest (ROIs) used for functional connectivity analysis.

tr.td: Anterior cingulate cortex, medial prefrontal cortex
Medial prefrontal cortex, anterior cingulate cortex
Left middle occipital gyrus, angular gyrus
Right middle occipital gyrus, angular gyrus
Left middle frontal gyrus, superior frontal gyrus
Right middle frontal gyrus, superior frontal gyrus

fn.p: *These regions belong to the following networks from the FINDLab website (http://findlab.stanford.edu/functional_ROIs.html): Anterior and Posterior Salience, Dorsal and Ventral Default Mode, and Left and Right Executive networks. DMN = Default Mode Network; SN = Salience Network; CEN = Central Executive Network.
